description: This source file implements the basic container object functions for the Slap Sco Collection Object within the Service Logic Aggregation Plane (SLAP) of a BroadWay Service Delivery System. It includes functions for creating, removing, enrolling objects, and initializing the collection object, along with associated class method definitions.

classes.name: SLAP_SCO_COLLECTION_OBJECT
classes.description: The main object representing a collection in the SLAP framework, with member variables and function pointers for managing collection behavior.

classes.name: PSLAP_SCO_COLLECTION_OBJECT
classes.description: Pointer type to the SLAP_SCO_COLLECTION_OBJECT structure.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE SlapScoColCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new SLAP SCO Collection Object, setting its contextual handles and method pointers.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapScoColRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the specified SLAP SCO Collection Object, freeing resources.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapScoColEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls required subordinate objects for the collection object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS SlapScoColInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the collection object, including setting member variables and function pointers.
